title: Dead calm
creator_credit: Phil Noyce, George Miller, Doug Mitchell, Terry Hayes, Warner Bros Pictures and Kennedy Miller Productions
brief_description: A psychothriller from the novel by Charles Williams about a married couple who have taken time out to recover from a family tragedy by spending time on their yacht at sea. This seemingly idyllic break soon turns into a nightmare when the couple rescue a young man from a drifting boat, unaware of the stranger’s violent and sociopathic personality that is about to set upon them. Stars Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman, Billy Zane. Cinematography by Dean Semler.
